title: Best sightstone junglers?
body: Who are the best sightstone junglers besides nunu?

replies.body: Or........and this is just a thought......you could all upgrade your trinkets, then no one needs a sightstone at all.

> Or........and this is just a thought......you could all upgrade your trinkets, then no one needs a sightstone at all.

Upgrading your trinket does not allow you to get oracles and have max wards all game.
Right, but it's cheaper and a more efficient build path sometimes to do what CuddlyKitten4 suggests.
The vision denial is very important though.

Sometimes it's very important. Sometimes it's not. Depends on the context. If you have {{champion:4}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:421}} on your team, then the vision game is completely different.

Same thing if your teammates bought 4 x {{item:3364}}. 
Sometimes a {{item:3083}}{{item:3361}}  > {{item:2045}} {{item:3364}} . Always depends on context.

{{champion:32}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:19}} all like the health.

{{champion:24}} {{champion:64}} like the ward hopping too. 

Any jungler who counterjungles some or values HP as a stat will use it very well. Really any jungler can buy sightstone, the wards it gives are generally undervalued.

I just replied with an almost identical post. Should have read yours first.
(Great minds right?)

Champs that scale well with health and don't need items to be effective.
{{champion:32}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:154}}  {{champion:64}} are all junglers I could see it being built on. You're playing more of a utility role if you're looking to build a sightstone early.

You literally can build it on any champion I've found, yes some champions who build damage, it can be inefficient, but it can mean the difference between knowing to gank bottom lane because you see their jungler in top lane because of your wards.
